content: this is a legal case in the municipal court of pazin where a coownership of a real estate property is being dissolved the petitioner wants to terminate the coownership and obtain full ownership rights by paying the counterparty a specific amount the counterparty agrees to this proposal and the petitioner is instructed to make the payment within 15 days once the payment is made the counterparty will hold a mortgage right on the property the land registry department is ordered to register the ownership right and the mortgage right various documents were presented as evidence confirming the coownership and the location of the property the petitioner has requested to purchase the counterpartys coownership share and the ministry of agriculture has confirmed the conditions for selling the share have been met the value of the property has been assessed based on data from the tax administration the parties have agreed to terminate the coownership and the petitioner will pay the counterparty an amount of 316000 kuna which is half of the market value of the property the counterparty has a lien on the property as specified in the preservation act
